DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether preovulatory uterine flush physiological saline effective treatment unexplained infertility .
DOC.brief_title: Preovulatory Uterine Flushing With Saline Treatment Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: In vitro fertilisation current reasonable treatment unexplained infertility . Uterine flushing , associate five-fold increase pregnancy perform preovulatory , propose new alternative . This treatment could flush debris alter inflammatory factor prevent fertilisation implantation . The objective study assess efficacy pre-ovulatory uterine flush physiological saline treatment unexplained infertility . This study randomise control trial base consecutive woman age 18 37 year consult unexplained infertility least one year . The day luteinizing hormone surge , 192 participant randomise two equal group either receive 20 millilitre physiological saline intra-uterine catheter 10 millilitre saline intravaginally . Investigators assess relative risk live birth ( primary outcome ) , well pregnancy one cycle treatment . Side effect , complication , acceptability intervention report .
DOC.criteria: Primary secondary infertility ≥12 month . Diagnosis unexplained infertility ≤36 month : AntiMullerian hormone ≥0.4 ng/mL and/or folliclestimulating hormone ≤13 IU/L early follicular phase ; regular cycle 2535 day , positive ovulation test , and/or luteal phase serum progesterone ≥25mmol/L natural cycle ; normal semen analysis ; normal uterine cavity ; patent tube . Negative genitourinary test gonorrhoea chlamydia ≤12 month . Body mass index ≥35 kg/m2 . Ongoing pregnancy .
